name: The Quest for the Ancient Ale (Version 0.7, Team 4)
name_original: The Quest for the Ancient Ale (Version 0.7, Team 4)
description:
Introduction

“The Quest for the Ancient Ale (insert itch.io  link here)” is the Game Jam project for the Artists Tavern community made by Team 4  (Olteanu - programming, items, UI design, game design;  goleafi - animations, backgrounds, sprites, icons, VFX; and Pow - potions). 

Inspirations

Our main inspiration came from Epic RPG, a discord bot known for retro text-based roleplaying with turn based combat.  Mainly, we reaped the retro mood and turn based combat ideas, still leaving space for the textual part, which will be developed in future.

Most of game is Mouse use only, so not to many explanations to add on this, we tried to be as much intuitive possible. So will be appreciate , if you comment what you think about this game and what should we add to make it better. 

If want to read about all process we did in this project, download the GDD we have in format PDF. 

Thank for Playing our game, and please follow us for more games, if you liked what we did in this project.

Version 0.6

We fix the Intro for this game, by taking out the Mp4 , and make it manual with sprites, a long and painful job. But we did it, we can concentrate more now , on game play, VFX, audio, and fixing bugs.

Version 0.7                  

 We fix:

  • fix the intro skip button, to stop any sound when press.
  • Add sound to Main Menu buttons, except the Option button.
  • Add a fire sound, for fire magic.
  • Add a ice sound, for ice magic.
  • Add a slash cut sound, for slash attack.
  • Add a water sound, for water magic.
  • Fix the layers of magic powers, was out.
  • Add a sound to map icon Brevia. When mouse is going on top.
  • Add a sound to map icon Forest. When mouse is going on top.
  • Add a sound to map icon Cave. When mouse is going on top.
  • Add a sound to map icon Volcano. When mouse is going on top.
  • Add a sound to map icon Boss. When mouse is going on top.
